description.originalText: Ruth takes pride in being a great childcare provider. She is responsible, works hard,  and is on time. She is loving and nurturing. You will be very satisfied with Ruth as your child care provider.

description.displayText: Ruth took care of my two girls (ages 4 and 8) this summer and she did such an amazing job. She was never late and followed all of my instructions with a positive attitude! I left for work with a piece of mind knowing they were in great hands. I highly recommend Ruth and will be using her again in the future. Thanks so much for everything!!!!
description.originalText: Ruth took care of my two girls (ages 4 and 8) this summer and she did such an amazing job. She was never late and followed all of my instructions with a positive attitude! I left for work with a piece of mind knowing they were in great hands. I highly recommend Ruth and will be using her again in the future. Thanks so much for everything!!!!

description.displayText:
Ruth has been taking care of our three children, aged from 5 to 11 years old, since last year. Her responsibility included picking up the children from school, and taking them to various extracurricular activities. On school holidays, she would take them to playground, play dates with friends and movies. 

With my older children, we have seen her joke and play board games, and talk about soccer and sports with excitement and passion. With my younger child, she plays with dolls, colors and reads stories. Ruth has been very patient and guided my daughter to write letters neatly and read books on her own.

Ruth is a very responsible babysitter and is always willing to do more for us. She makes sound judgement and alerts us immediately if there are any unexpected visitors or if the behavior of our children seems out of the ordinary.

We have always felt comfortable leaving our children in her care. We would strongly recommend Ruth as a babysitter.

description.displayText: Ruth is very responsible and caring with children.
description.originalText: Ruth is very responsible and caring with children.

description.displayText: Ruth babysat my 8 year old daughter on many days off from school over the course of last year. She is amazing with kids. She is very warm, friendly, communicative and professional. She encouraged my daughter to read, helped her practice her dance routines and took her to the playground. I had a piece of mind knowing my daughter is in good hands and, more importantly, my daughter loved Ruth and had a great time every time she was with her.
